name: ggr-winti
description: Eine LaTeX-Klasse für parlamentarische Vorstösse (Motionen, Interpellationen, Postulate, Schriftliche Anfragen) im Parlament Winterthur.

scripts.start: concurrently -k "npm run start --workspace=@ggr-winti/lib" "npm run start --workspace=app" "npm run start --workspace=srv"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -k "npm run start:dev -w=@ggr-winti/lib" "npm run start:dev -w=app" "npm run start:dev -w=srv"
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && rm -rf src/app/dist src/srv/dist
